member.summary: Manages the retrieval of Configuration data.

member.name: F:Microsoft.IdentityModel.Protocols.ConfigurationManager`1.DefaultAutomaticRefreshInterval
member.summary: 1 day is the default time interval that afterwards, will obtain new configuration.

member.name: F:Microsoft.IdentityModel.Protocols.ConfigurationManager`1.DefaultRefreshInterval
member.summary: 30 seconds is the default time interval that must pass for to obtain a new configuration.

member.name: F:Microsoft.IdentityModel.Protocols.ConfigurationManager`1.MinimumAutomaticRefreshInterval
member.summary: 5 minutes is the minimum value for automatic refresh. can not be set less than this value.

member.name: F:Microsoft.IdentityModel.Protocols.ConfigurationManager`1.MinimumRefreshInterval
member.summary: 1 second is the minimum time interval that must pass for to obtain new configuration.

member.name: M:Microsoft.IdentityModel.Protocols.ConfigurationManager`1.RequestRefresh
member.summary:
Requests that then next call to obtain new configuration.
If the last refresh was greater than then the next call to will retrieve new configuration.
If == then this method does nothing.
